title: WaveSpeed AI - Highlight Your Best Features Instantly

hero.heading: Highlight Your Best Features in Photos
hero.description: Enter your prompt to automatically enhance and spotlight key areas of your image. Make your photos stand out with precision highlights.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Highlight the main subject, emphasize the best features, enhance colors...

examples.heading: Before & After Highlights Examples
examples.description: Discover how WaveSpeed AI can enhance your images by highlighting important features with accuracy.

items.title: Emphasize Key Features

items.title: Color Enhancement
items.imageAlt: Example showing color enhancement in a photo
items.description: Make your images pop by enhancing colors and clarity.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our state-of-the-art AI technology highlights your best moments seamlessly.

items.title: Speedy Results
items.description: Achieve impressive results in seconds with our cutting-edge AI technology.

items.title: User-Friendly
items.description: No design experience needed. Just upload your photo and let our AI highlight the best elements for you.

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: Your images are processed safely in your browser, ensuring full privacy at all times.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to enhanced photos

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Easily upload your photo by dragging, dropping, or browsing. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Highlight Detection
items.description: Our advanced AI intelligently identifies and enhances key features in your photo, ensuring stunning results.

items.title: Download Your Enhanced Image
items.description: Preview the enhancements using our interactive comparison and download in high quality.

testimonial.heading: Hear From Our Users
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users transforming their images with precision highlights

items.name: Emily Smith
items.comment: The highlight feature completely transformed my portrait photos! It's like magic!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Explore common inquiries about the AI highlight detector

items.title: What features can the AI highlight detector enhance?
items.description: The AI highlight detector can enhance key features such as faces, objects, and colors, making them stand out while improving overall image quality.

items.title: Is this feature free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Every user receives 30 free credits daily to enhance images. Additional credits can be earned through engagement on our Discord community.

items.title: Can I use the highlighted images commercially?
items.description: Yes, users on any paid subscription plan have the rights to use their enhanced images for commercial purposes. Free users can utilize them for personal projects.

items.title: How is my privacy maintained during processing?
items.description: WaveSpeed's technology processes all images locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded, ensuring complete privacy and data security.

footer.heading: Ready to Highlight Your Features?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the stunning enhancements for yourself. No sign-up necessary.
